title: I recently moved to Wilmington.  I live in a small subdivision off of Military Cutoff Rd.  There are many shops, grocery stores, etc, on the other side of the road.  Why aren\'t there crosswalks so that one could just walk across the street instead of driving?  Risking walking/running across 6-7 lanes of traffic doesn\'t seem smart.
